column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Amazon EC2: Increase number on instances from 12 to 20
Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL: Increase storage amount from 1 TB to 2TB, change instance type from db.m5.4xlarge to db.m5d.8xlarge, add backup store and snapshots
Network Address Translation (NAT) Gateway: Increase number of NAT from 1 to 2
